title: FSD Sys
content:
Hi!

I am looking for typefaces that compliment [FSD Sys](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506123317/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fsd/sys/) [as shown below] and am kinda stumped at the moment, with DIN and Univers as my current options. But they aren’t working out for me :|

I would like something much heavy[ier], but I’m open to any suggestions at this point! Maybe even a serif?

Cheers—  
TH

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506123317im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sys_abc_5589.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506123317im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sys_inktraps_4857.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506123317im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sy_eyerer_3826.jpg)
author: TypeHead

comments.content:
The link leads to an MF search page.  
Cheers, Si

Sorry bout that, was missing the last slash (wierd):  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/fsd/sys **/**](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506123317/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fsd/sys/)
